text: Aloha Stadium is a stadium in Honolulu, Hawaii, United States. It is the largest stadium in the state of Hawaii. It is located in the western Honolulu suburb of Halawa. The stadium is home to the University of Hawaii Rainbow Warriors football team (Mountain West Conference, NCAA Division I FBS). The stadium opened in 1975. It has a seating capacity of 50,000. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1975 establishments in the United States Category:Sports buildings in the United States Category:Buildings and structures in Hawaii Category:Honolulu
title: Aloha Stadium
